table-reference.title: Drainage from cooling units within refrigerated chambers or cooling chambers

row.entry: Drain water must be contained and removed by either a wall-mounted channel or a spoon drain located under the coil.
Drain water must be confined by kerbs, of a height not less than 150 mm, and directed to a trapped drain outlet.
Drain water must be confined by suitable insulated drip trays directly connected to the drainage system.
